snippet: Play finally began after a more than two-and-a-half hour delay caused by torrential rain at the French Open on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Play finally began after a more than two-and-a-half hour delay caused by torrential rain at the French Open on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Rain Abates at French Open, Holder Wawrinka in Action
headline.main: Rain Abates at French Open, Holder Wawrinka in Action
